name: The Story of Nessa
description:
I'll update this later, but this is for Peanut Butter Game Jam, and special thanks to Sangled (her youtube) for letting me use her Picrew for the heads of the main characters.

Also yeah, this is way incomplete, I had to rush the endings a bit, there are a feeeew typos, and there is a bug with one of the endings where it keeps going. I'll come back to this, I promise.
